dataList.dlg: Have thee ever beheld a Lantern so grossly incandescent? Remain at my side, and darkness shall never consume us!
Today is another day! Thus I shall toil to gather more energy. Dost thou not find thyself growing delighted at the notion of numerous happenings in this hallway today?
'Tis time for a midday meal. I am far from famished... alas, these little teeth fellows are chattering expectantly. Heh heh.
Verily, is this not the time for the Lantern to shine?
Come hither and behold, Manager Esquire! Is it not so fascinating to see such a beaut of a flower in the middle of a hallway? Lo! If I poke it so, it fidgets and twitches...
FIE!!! Didst thou not hear the siren indicating that an Abnormality is on the loose? Make haste, make haste! Make way! 'Tis my chance to shine!
Quite warm it is, this furry garb! Ah, take care not to pet it too much. It may nibble thy finger off. Or fingers...!
Lady Outis (It's Captain Outis!) has, ahem, shared aught with me... That I may be quite adept at playing the role of a 'bait'! Quickly hide behind me at the first sign of danger, thou must!

Behold this Lantern for a while. Dost thou not feel the warm heart and good fortune rumbling within thyself?
Even at a place such as this where good fortune seems so ill-available...
To where hast thou gone, Manager Esquire?! Thou mustn't let the Lantern ambush and nibble thee!
I cannot contain my joy Manager Esquire!!! Prithee, bring forth more villains for me to thrash!
I! Can be quite the excellent bait, if I do say so myself!
Ah, my time to flash has come once again!
Is there aught else to suppress?!
I shall chew thee to shreds!
Just thee wait! Thou shall be devoured whole posthaste!
... 'Twas but a moment of hesitation.
Om nom.
So I have always... shone so brightly...
Ah... to follow the Lantern is to walk the path of answers!
The answer... yet remains out of sight.
Have I not flashed so radiantly today?!
Thus I have gobbled them up without a trace! I hope Miss Hod finds it within herself to compliment mine achievements!
Fie, I was the one to be gobbled up by these very fangs...
